@luissousa said:
I'm thinking about buying a server from netcup. Can anyone tell me how their vServer CPUs perform vs Root server CPUs? This would primarily be used for plex

Netcup is cool, the vServer is good but low performance compared with the Gold from root server. Should be enough for video transcoding, but keep in mind that they are shared, so don't abuse them.
